ability.name: Dramatic Reveal
ability.flavor: A little stage trickery, and where once stood a foe, now stands a friend!

metadata.flavor: A little stage trickery, and where once stood a foe, now stands a friend!

effects.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you reduce a creature to 0 Stamina using an ability, you can use a free triggered action to teleport an ally within distance of that ability into the creature's space in a plume of rose petals. You or the teleported ally can then make a melee free strike.
